channel.title: Comments on: How to do nothing
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Ariel, your comment is a comment about nothing.
item.content:encoded: Ariel, your comment is a comment about nothing.

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description:
I don't get it. To me it seems like those are instructions of how to get ready for meditation, which is not nothing. By Wikipedia, nothing is the lack or absence of anything - which is still something...
Actually I like your side note, since it doesn't express nothing as something.
item.content:encoded:
I don’t get it. To me it seems like those are instructions of how to get ready for meditation, which is not nothing.
By Wikipedia, nothing is the lack or absence of anything – which is still something…

Actually I like your side note, since it doesn’t express nothing as something.
